TopicTitle: Game keeps crashing no matter what I do.

Articles.Content:
I scattered the internet looking for an answer and found nothing at all. First I installed the game put everything on max and at that point every time I opened map the game will just freeze and crash. then I went and downloaded tons of graphics mods and other things hoping that maybe my pc is just too powerful for this game and again same thing. went and reinstalled the game put everything on normal setting now game works for a bit and when on my second career mission I try to re-enter atmosphere game freeze and crashes again. been going at it for a few hours cant find any solution no matter where i search.

My PC:
rtx 3080
i7-9700k
32gb ram ddr 3200hz
windows 11.

game running at 1440p on an m.2 ssd.

most parts on my pc including ssd graphics card and ram are completely new and were replaced around 2 months ago never had any issue with any other game beside this one.
